NPS rangers circa 1950

About

B&W snapshot of six National Park Service (NPS) rangers (all men) wearing regulation button-down shirts and trousers with Stetson hats, badges, neckties, belts, and dark shoes or boots. Print is 3 by 4 inches.

Title

Creator
National Park Service
Contributor
